content.description: Durable Functions helps to write stateful functions in a serverless environment. It defines stateful workflows by writing orchestrator functions and stateful entities by writing entity functions. It manages state and thus allowing the programmers to focus on the business logic. In this session, we will see the patterns of Azure Durable Functions and an implementation of it.

content.event: Serverless powered web forms with Slack
content.description: Join us for the event on Serverless with Slack. The new aspects of the technology with introduction and advanced topics. Try serverless from your browser during this workshop. Build your first Serverless Backend as a Service with Slack.

content.event: COURSE: Production Ready Serverless taught by Yan Cui, €880
content.description: Start with an intro to Lambda, moving onto API security, testing strategies, CI/CD, secret management, and operational best practices for monitoring & troubleshooting.

content.event: Build your 1st Twitter Bot with Azure Serverless & Github actions
content.description: In this session you will learn how to use Logic Apps and Github actions to automate the boring bits of writing a Twitter bot. (No, not DevOps). It's a session on how to build a quick, lightweight, low cost solution.

In this session, we will look at some of the most popular deployment frameworks to AWS and focus especially on CDK. We will explain the theory of how CDK works and show in a few demo's how container, serverless solutions but also many other solutions can be deployed easily.

content.event: Meetup talk about CDK for Serverless
content.description: Join us at the ServerlessDays Hamburg Meetup! For this edition, Marek Kuczynski from AWS will talk about the CDK and how it can be used to build serverless apps.

content.event: Serverless Framework: Deploying Step Functions, Lambdas, and more on AWS
content.description: Serverless computing is all the rage right now, but it can be hard to find practical use cases to help you take advantage of the potential cost savings and/or mass scaling capabilities it can enable. Russ VanderMey will walk us through some of the ins and outs of the Serverless Framework to show how to leverage it to our advantage in AWS.

In this session, you will be introduced to the history and future of serverless. We will talk about the types of serverless technologies that are available and implement a simple example application. From there we will see what types of problems you might encounter while developing serverless applications. Lastly, we will discuss the future of serverless.

Newry Digital are delighted to have Dave Anderson join us to chat about a Serverless first approach. Dave Anderson, director of technology from Liberty IT, will describe a Serverless First approach for writing software. What are the building blocks you and your team need, how to get started and some gotchas to watch out for.

content.event: AWS Lambda and Serverless framework Part Two
content.description:
Modern applications are all built using Serverless Computing. Serverless is one of the top-paying cloud skills. In this talk, we will explore the AWS Serverless framework. Serverless architecture is a way to build and run applications and services without having to manage infrastructure.
You’ll learn Serverless Computing from beginning to end.
ServerlessDays Warsaw is a 1-day conference about Serverless technologies with a full day of talks.

You want to build great cloud-native applications. You don’t want to bother with cumbersome server infrastructure. Microsoft Azure offers a host of serverless choices, but where to start? In this session, we will explore the “bread and butter” serverless offerings that form the building blocks of most applications.
We are combining the 2020 ANZ serverless community events under the ServerlessDays ANZ banner and host speakers from the Serverless community right around the world.
content.organizer: ServerlessDays Sydney, Melbourne, Perth and Auckland

content.description: Get hands-on experience with AWS and serverless applications in this workshop. You'll deploy a simple web application that enables users to vote for their favorite options for a set of questions. It also provides the capability to create their own custom polls. With the knowledge from the workshop, you can build and deploy your own serverless applications.

content.event: Build HTTP-based API endpoints using Azure Functions
content.description: Topics that will be covered during this session: A robust developer experience, A wide range of triggering options, An innovative way of accessing and processing data, “Serverless” execution model, Open source runtime that runs anywhere, Other benefits, Demo

content.event: COURSE: Advanced React taught by Simona Cotin & Artur Daschevici, €440
content.description: This course gives a good basis for building a React Application with an associated design system. At the end you will have a highly reusable boilerplate for building a scalable component ecosystem.

content.event: Webinar: Serverless Python Apps with AWS Chalice
content.description: Acompañanos este sábado 22 de agosto a las 07:00 pm en nuestro webinar de Serverless Python Apps with AWS Chalice, el mismo será impartido por nuestro amigo y Founder CEO de Marcos Organizador de Negocios, Eneldo Serrata.

content.event: Webinar: Debugging Slow Lambda Response Times
content.description: In this webinar, we will show you how to quickly identify and debug latency problems due to 3rd-party services, and some best practices for dealing with poor performing 3rd party services.
More than a year has passed since AWS CDK went GA and it has grown into a family of products (AWS CDK, CDKTF, CDK8s). Let’s take one day and talk Serverless and multi cloud all in CDK
ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.
We bring together the world’s leading software architects and cloud experts to share their ideas and knowledge.
Third edition of ServerlessDays Virtual with a busload of great speakers and talks.
